summary: Tanakh is an acronym that is almost the same thing as saying the "Hebrew Bible."
full_text: A kolel or kollel  is an institute for full-time, advanced study of the Talmud and rabbinic literature. Like a yeshiva, a kolel features shiurim  and learning sedarim ; unlike a yeshiva, the student body of a kolel are all married men. Kolels generally pay a regular monthly stipend to their members.
title: Kollel
